title: Миллион вопросов
overview: A new show with the iconic TV presenter Dmitry Dibrov, in which he will return to the interview genre. The master's guests will be people of art, stars of show business, the Internet and sports, heroes of the infospace and trendsetters of the generation, legends of the era. Viewers will enjoy a unique graphic design: inserts between interview blocks with detailed infographics about the stages of the hero's life and creative path. And, of course, a million sharp and interesting questions from the host.
